Payment Request API Demo

Click the buttons below to trigger the new Payment Request API in a supported browser. (Built using/tested in Chrome 61).

Timeout simulating BE request

These buttons can be used when the server is not in use, and this file is being accessed directly in a browser.

Actual BE requests to server

These buttons cannot be used unless the server is being used and serving the page, so requests can be made for data.
